actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide tax incentives to encourage physicians, dentists, and optometrists to practice in physician shortage areas.

summary.text: Allows an income tax exclusion under the Internal Revenue Code for income of physicians, dentist, and optometrists who practice for at least two years in physician shortages areas as certified by the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare. Prescribes limitations on the amount of such tax exclusion.

titles.title: A bill to provide tax incentives to encourage physicians, dentists, and optometrists to practice in physician shortage areas.
